Overview

TaskLocksQueryBinder contains methods for accessing task locks.

Instance Method Details

#acquire(**kwargs) ⇒ Response

Acquire a task lock.

Parameters:

  • name (String) —

    The name, or key, of the task lock.

  • ttl (Integer) —

    The number of seconds until the lock should be auto-released.

Returns:

  • (Response) —

    The task lock. Access via Response#data#task_lock.

def acquire(**kwargs)
  Response.new TaskLocks::AcquireTaskLockMutation.execute(client: client, **kwargs)
end
